title: Clinton campaign’s claim that Trump would ‘force schools to allow guns in classrooms’
text: Analysis by Michelle Ye Hee Lee “FACT: Donald Trump would force schools to allow guns in classrooms on his first day in office.” — Hillary Clinton campaign post on Twitter , May 14, 2016 Most read 1 Dan Diamond and Paige Winfield Cunningham GOP plans to replace Obamacare have failed. Here’s what lawmakers propose now. 2 Column Ben Noll and Daniel Wolfe How snowy could it be where you live this winter?
